name: Explosion Golf
description:
Stranded on foreign planets, our extraterrestrial hero must find his way back to his spaceship, but the only tools available are... bombs?

Blast your way through challenging levels in this journey back home!

Credits:

  • Chris Cannon: 3D Art
  • Vítor Fernandes: Programming
  • Curtis Hagan: 2D Art, Sound and Music
  • Shree Kulkarni: Level Design
  • John Li: Programming
